what_it_does: Computes industrial-depth CAPEX envelopes from deterministic subsystem scaling proxies.
Computes industrial-depth OPEX and LCOE-lite from CAPEX envelope + electric/tritium/maintenance/replacement ledgers.
Publishes explicit regime bins (magnet technology family, B_peak bin, divertor heat-flux regime) and dominant cost driver attribution.
Provides optional hard caps (NaN disables) for feasibility-first governance.
what_it_does_not_do: Does not regress v383 structured economics outputs (it is additive).
Does not fit regressions, perform stochastic costing, or optimize within truth.
Does not hide infeasibility with penalties or smoothing.

defaults.notes: Numerical coefficients are stored in docs/cost_calibration_default.json and are user-overridable. This contract pins the existence of outputs + their interpretation, not the calibration values.
